Name: CVE-2014-8760
Description: ejabberd before 2.1.13 does not enforce the starttls_required setting when compression is used, which causes clients to establish connections without encryption.
References: BID:70415   |   URL:http://www.securityfocus.com/bid/70415   |   CONFIRM:http://advisories.mageia.org/MGASA-2014-0417.html   |   CONFIRM:https://github.com/processone/ejabberd/commit/7bdc1151b   |   MANDRIVA:MDVSA-2014:207   |   URL:http://www.mandriva.com/security/advisories?name=MDVSA-2014:207   |   MANDRIVA:MDVSA-2015:175   |   URL:http://www.mandriva.com/security/advisories?name=MDVSA-2015:175   |   MISC:https://bugzilla.redhat.com/show_bug.cgi?id=1153839   |   MLIST:[Operators] 20141013 ejabberd: compression allows circumvention of encryption   |   URL:http://mail.jabber.org/pipermail/operators/2014-October/002438.html   |   MLIST:[oss-security] 20141013 CVE request: ejabberd compression allows cirucumvention of encryption despite starttls_required   |   URL:http://seclists.org/oss-sec/2014/q4/312

Name: CVE-2014-8761
Description: inc/template.php in DokuWiki before 2014-05-05a only checks for access to the root namespace, which allows remote attackers to access arbitrary images via a media file details ajax call.
References: CONFIRM:http://advisories.mageia.org/MGASA-2014-0438.html   |   CONFIRM:https://github.com/splitbrain/dokuwiki/issues/765   |   DEBIAN:DSA-3059   |   URL:http://www.debian.org/security/2014/dsa-3059   |   MISC:https://bugs.dokuwiki.org/index.php?do=details&task_id=2647#comment6204   |   MLIST:[oss-security] 20141013 CVE request: various security flaws in dokuwiki   |   URL:http://www.openwall.com/lists/oss-security/2014/10/13/3   |   MLIST:[oss-security] 20141016 Re: CVE request: various security flaws in dokuwiki   |   URL:http://www.openwall.com/lists/oss-security/2014/10/16/9   |   SECUNIA:61983   |   URL:http://secunia.com/advisories/61983

Name: CVE-2014-8762
Description: The ajax_mediadiff function in DokuWiki before 2014-05-05a allows remote attackers to access arbitrary images via a crafted namespace in the ns parameter.
References: BID:70404   |   URL:http://www.securityfocus.com/bid/70404   |   CONFIRM:http://advisories.mageia.org/MGASA-2014-0438.html   |   CONFIRM:https://github.com/splitbrain/dokuwiki/issues/765   |   DEBIAN:DSA-3059   |   URL:http://www.debian.org/security/2014/dsa-3059   |   MLIST:[oss-security] 20141013 CVE request: various security flaws in dokuwiki   |   URL:http://www.openwall.com/lists/oss-security/2014/10/13/3   |   MLIST:[oss-security] 20141016 Re: CVE request: various security flaws in dokuwiki   |   URL:http://www.openwall.com/lists/oss-security/2014/10/16/9   |   SECUNIA:61983   |   URL:http://secunia.com/advisories/61983

Name: CVE-2014-8763
Description: DokuWiki before 2014-05-05b, when using Active Directory for LDAP authentication, allows remote attackers to bypass authentication via a password starting with a null (\0) character and a valid user name, which triggers an unauthenticated bind.
References: CONFIRM:http://advisories.mageia.org/MGASA-2014-0438.html   |   CONFIRM:https://github.com/splitbrain/dokuwiki/pull/868   |   DEBIAN:DSA-3059   |   URL:http://www.debian.org/security/2014/dsa-3059   |   MLIST:[dokuwiki] 20140918 Fwd: Dokuwiki (maybe) security issue: Null byte poisoning in LDAP authentication   |   URL:http://www.freelists.org/post/dokuwiki/Fwd-Dokuwiki-maybe-security-issue-Null-byte-poisoning-in-LDAP-authentication   |   MLIST:[oss-security] 20141013 CVE request: various security flaws in dokuwiki   |   URL:http://www.openwall.com/lists/oss-security/2014/10/13/3   |   MLIST:[oss-security] 20141016 Re: CVE request: various security flaws in dokuwiki   |   URL:http://www.openwall.com/lists/oss-security/2014/10/16/9   |   SECUNIA:61983   |   URL:http://secunia.com/advisories/61983

Name: CVE-2014-8764
Description: DokuWiki 2014-05-05a and earlier, when using Active Directory for LDAP authentication, allows remote attackers to bypass authentication via a user name and password starting with a null (\0) character, which triggers an anonymous bind.
References: CONFIRM:http://advisories.mageia.org/MGASA-2014-0438.html   |   CONFIRM:https://github.com/splitbrain/dokuwiki/pull/868   |   DEBIAN:DSA-3059   |   URL:http://www.debian.org/security/2014/dsa-3059   |   MLIST:[dokuwiki] 20140918 Fwd: Dokuwiki (maybe) security issue: Null byte poisoning in LDAP authentication   |   URL:http://www.freelists.org/post/dokuwiki/Fwd-Dokuwiki-maybe-security-issue-Null-byte-poisoning-in-LDAP-authentication   |   MLIST:[oss-security] 20141013 CVE request: various security flaws in dokuwiki   |   URL:http://www.openwall.com/lists/oss-security/2014/10/13/3   |   MLIST:[oss-security] 20141016 Re: CVE request: various security flaws in dokuwiki   |   URL:http://www.openwall.com/lists/oss-security/2014/10/16/9   |   SECUNIA:61983   |   URL:http://secunia.com/advisories/61983

Name: CVE-2014-8765
Description: Multiple cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerabilities in the Project Issue File Review module (PIFR) module 6.x-2.x before 6.x-2.17 for Drupal allow (1) remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via a crafted patch, which triggers a PIFR client to test the patch and return the results to the PIFR_Server test results page or (2) remote authenticated users with the "manage PIFR environments" permission to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via vectors involving a PIFR_Server administrative page.

Name: CVE-2014-8766
Description: Multiple SQL injection vulnerabilities in Allomani Weblinks 1.0 allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary SQL commands via the (1) cat parameter in a browse action to index.php or (2) unspecified parameters to admin.php.

Name: CVE-2014-8767
Description: Integer underflow in the olsr_print function in tcpdump 3.9.6 through 4.6.2, when in verbose mode, allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (crash) via a crafted length value in an OLSR frame.
References: APPLE:APPLE-SA-2015-08-13-2   |   URL:http://lists.apple.com/archives/security-announce/2015/Aug/msg00001.html   |   BID:71150   |   URL:http://www.securityfocus.com/bid/71150   |   BUGTRAQ:20141118 CVE-2014-8767 tcpdump denial of service in verbose mode using malformed OLSR payload   |   URL:http://www.securityfocus.com/archive/1/534011/100/0/threaded   |   CONFIRM:http://advisories.mageia.org/MGASA-2014-0503.html   |   CONFIRM:http://www.oracle.com/technetwork/topics/security/bulletinjul2015-2511963.html   |   CONFIRM:https://support.apple.com/kb/HT205031   |   DEBIAN:DSA-3086   |   URL:http://www.debian.org/security/2014/dsa-3086   |   FULLDISC:20141118 CVE-2014-8767 tcpdump denial of service in verbose mode using malformed OLSR payload   |   URL:http://seclists.org/fulldisclosure/2014/Nov/47   |   MANDRIVA:MDVSA-2014:240   |   URL:http://www.mandriva.com/security/advisories?name=MDVSA-2014:240   |   MANDRIVA:MDVSA-2015:125   |   URL:http://www.mandriva.com/security/advisories?name=MDVSA-2015:125   |   MISC:http://packetstormsecurity.com/files/129155/tcpdump-4.6.2-OSLR-Denial-Of-Service.html   |   SUSE:openSUSE-SU-2015:0284   |   URL:http://lists.opensuse.org/opensuse-updates/2015-02/msg00062.html   |   UBUNTU:USN-2433-1   |   URL:http://www.ubuntu.com/usn/USN-2433-1   |   XF:tcpdump-cve20148767-dos(98765)   |   URL:https://exchange.xforce.ibmcloud.com/vulnerabilities/98765

Name: CVE-2014-8768
Description: Multiple Integer underflows in the geonet_print function in tcpdump 4.5.0 through 4.6.2, when in verbose mode, allow remote attackers to cause a denial of service (segmentation fault and crash) via a crafted length value in a Geonet frame.
References: BID:71155   |   URL:http://www.securityfocus.com/bid/71155   |   BUGTRAQ:20141118 CVE-2014-8768 tcpdump denial of service in verbose mode using malformed Geonet payload   |   URL:http://www.securityfocus.com/archive/1/534010/100/0/threaded   |   CONFIRM:http://www.oracle.com/technetwork/topics/security/bulletinjul2015-2511963.html   |   EXPLOIT-DB:35359   |   URL:http://www.exploit-db.com/exploits/35359   |   FULLDISC:20141118 CVE-2014-8768 tcpdump denial of service in verbose mode using malformed Geonet payload   |   URL:http://seclists.org/fulldisclosure/2014/Nov/48   |   MISC:http://packetstormsecurity.com/files/129156/tcpdump-4.6.2-Geonet-Denial-Of-Service.html   |   SUSE:openSUSE-SU-2015:0284   |   URL:http://lists.opensuse.org/opensuse-updates/2015-02/msg00062.html   |   UBUNTU:USN-2433-1   |   URL:http://www.ubuntu.com/usn/USN-2433-1   |   XF:tpcdump-cve20148768-dos(98766)   |   URL:https://exchange.xforce.ibmcloud.com/vulnerabilities/98766

Name: CVE-2014-8769
Description: tcpdump 3.8 through 4.6.2 might allow remote attackers to obtain sensitive information from memory or cause a denial of service (packet loss or segmentation fault) via a crafted Ad hoc On-Demand Distance Vector (AODV) packet, which triggers an out-of-bounds memory access.
References: APPLE:APPLE-SA-2015-08-13-2   |   URL:http://lists.apple.com/archives/security-announce/2015/Aug/msg00001.html   |   BID:71153   |   URL:http://www.securityfocus.com/bid/71153   |   BUGTRAQ:20141118 CVE-2014-8769 tcpdump unreliable output using malformed AOVD payload   |   URL:http://www.securityfocus.com/archive/1/534009/100/0/threaded   |   CONFIRM:http://advisories.mageia.org/MGASA-2014-0503.html   |   CONFIRM:http://www.oracle.com/technetwork/topics/security/bulletinjul2015-2511963.html   |   CONFIRM:https://support.apple.com/kb/HT205031   |   DEBIAN:DSA-3086   |   URL:http://www.debian.org/security/2014/dsa-3086   |   FULLDISC:20141118 CVE-2014-8769 tcpdump unreliable output using malformed AOVD payload   |   URL:http://seclists.org/fulldisclosure/2014/Nov/49   |   MANDRIVA:MDVSA-2014:240   |   URL:http://www.mandriva.com/security/advisories?name=MDVSA-2014:240   |   MANDRIVA:MDVSA-2015:125   |   URL:http://www.mandriva.com/security/advisories?name=MDVSA-2015:125   |   MISC:http://packetstormsecurity.com/files/129157/tcpdump-4.6.2-AOVD-Unreliable-Output.html   |   SUSE:openSUSE-SU-2015:0284   |   URL:http://lists.opensuse.org/opensuse-updates/2015-02/msg00062.html   |   UBUNTU:USN-2433-1   |   URL:http://www.ubuntu.com/usn/USN-2433-1   |   XF:tcpdump-cve20148769-dos(98764)   |   URL:https://exchange.xforce.ibmcloud.com/vulnerabilities/98764

Name: CVE-2014-8770
Description: Unrestricted file upload vulnerability in magmi/web/magmi.php in the MAGMI (aka Magento Mass Importer) plugin 0.7.17a and earlier for Magento Community Edition (CE) allows remote authenticated users to execute arbitrary code by uploading a ZIP file that contains a PHP file, then accessing the PHP file via a direct request to it in magmi/plugins/.

Name: CVE-2014-8771
Description: Multiple cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerabilities in the admin area in X3 CMS 0.5.1 and 0.5.1.1 allow remote attackers to hijack the authentication of administrators via unspecified vectors.

Name: CVE-2014-8772
Description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in the search_controller in X3 CMS 0.5.1 and 0.5.1.1 allows remote authenticated users to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via the search parameter.

Name: CVE-2014-8773
Description: MODX Revolution 2.x before 2.2.15 allows remote attackers to bypass the cross-site request forgery (CSRF) protection mechanism by (1) omitting the CSRF token or via a (2) long string in the CSRF token parameter.

Name: CVE-2014-8774
Description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in manager/index.php in MODX Revolution 2.x before 2.2.15 allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via the context_key parameter.

Name: CVE-2014-8775
Description: MODX Revolution 2.x before 2.2.15 does not include the HTTPOnly flag in a Set-Cookie header for the session cookie, which makes it easier for remote attackers to obtain potentially sensitive information via script access to this cookie.

Name: CVE-2014-8778
Description: Checkmarx CxSAST (formerly CxSuite) before 7.1.8 allows remote authenticated users to bypass the CxQL sandbox protection mechanism and execute arbitrary C# code by asserting the (1) System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.Unrestricted or (2) System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.AllFlags permission.

Name: CVE-2014-8779
Description: Pexip Infinity before 8 uses the same SSH host keys across different customers' installations, which allows man-in-the-middle attackers to spoof Management and Conferencing Nodes by leveraging these keys.
References: BID:72359   |   URL:http://www.securityfocus.com/bid/72359   |   BUGTRAQ:20150129 CVE-2014-8779: SSH Host keys on Pexip Infinity   |   URL:http://www.securityfocus.com/archive/1/534576/100/0/threaded   |   CONFIRM:http://www.pexip.com/sites/pexip/files/Pexip_Security_Bulletin_2015-01-02.pdf   |   MISC:http://packetstormsecurity.com/files/130174/Pexip-Infinity-Non-Unique-SSH-Host-Keys.html

Description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in Jease 2.11 allows remote authenticated users to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via a content section note.

Name: CVE-2014-8788
Description: GleamTech FileVista before 6.1 allows remote authenticated users to obtain sensitive information via a crafted path when saving a zip file, which reveals the installation path in an error message.

Name: CVE-2014-8789
Description: GleamTech FileVista before 6.1 allows remote authenticated users to create arbitrary files and possibly execute arbitrary code via a crafted path in a zip archive, which is not properly handled during extraction.

Name: CVE-2014-8799
Description: Directory traversal vulnerability in the dp_img_resize function in php/dp-functions.php in the DukaPress plugin before 2.5.4 for WordPress allows remote attackers to read arbitrary files via a .. (dot dot) in the src parameter to lib/dp_image.php.

Name: CVE-2014-8800
Description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in nextend-facebook-settings.php in the Nextend Facebook Connect plugin before 1.5.1 for WordPress allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via the fb_login_button parameter in a newfb_update_options action.

Name: CVE-2014-8801
Description: Directory traversal vulnerability in services/getfile.php in the Paid Memberships Pro plugin before 1.7.15 for WordPress allows remote attackers to read arbitrary files via a .. (dot dot) in the QUERY_STRING in a getfile action to wp-admin/admin-ajax.php.

Name: CVE-2014-8802
Description: The Pie Register plugin before 2.0.14 for WordPress does not properly restrict access to certain functions in pie-register.php, which allows remote attackers to (1) add a user by uploading a crafted CSV file or (2) activate a user account via a verifyit action.

Description: Multiple cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerabilities in the WP Symposium plugin before 14.11 for WordPress allow remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via the (1) text parameter in an addComment action to ajax/profile_functions.php, (2) compose_text parameter in a sendMail action to ajax/mail_functions.php, (3) comment parameter in an add_comment action to ajax/lounge_functions.php, or (4) name parameter in a create_album action to ajax/gallery_functions.php.

Name: CVE-2014-8810
Description: SQL injection vulnerability in ajax/mail_functions.php in the WP Symposium plugin before 14.11 for WordPress allows remote authenticated users to execute arbitrary SQL commands via the tray parameter in a getMailMessage action.

Name: CVE-2014-8816
Description: CoreGraphics in Apple OS X before 10.10 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code or cause a denial of service (memory corruption and application crash) via a crafted PDF document.

Name: CVE-2014-8817
Description: coresymbolicationd in CoreSymbolication in Apple OS X before 10.10.2 does not verify that expected data types are present in XPC messages, which allows attackers to execute arbitrary code in a privileged context via a crafted app, as demonstrated by lack of verification of xpc_dictionary_get_value API return values during handling of a (1) match_mmap_archives, (2) delete_mmap_archives, (3) write_mmap_archive, or (4) read_mmap_archive command.

Name: CVE-2014-8819
Description: The Intel Graphics Driver in Apple OS X before 10.10.2 allows local users to gain privileges via unspecified vectors, a different vulnerability than CVE-2014-8820 and CVE-2014-8821.

Name: CVE-2014-8820
Description: The Intel Graphics Driver in Apple OS X before 10.10.2 allows local users to gain privileges via unspecified vectors, a different vulnerability than CVE-2014-8819 and CVE-2014-8821.

Name: CVE-2014-8821
Description: The Intel Graphics Driver in Apple OS X before 10.10.2 allows local users to gain privileges via unspecified vectors, a different vulnerability than CVE-2014-8819 and CVE-2014-8820.

Name: CVE-2014-8822
Description: IOHIDFamily in Apple OS X before 10.10.2 allows attackers to execute arbitrary code in a kernel context or cause a denial of service (write to kernel memory) via a crafted app that calls an unspecified user-client method.

Name: CVE-2014-8823
Description: The IOUSBControllerUserClient::ReadRegister function in the IOUSB controller in IOUSBFamily in Apple OS X before 10.10.2 allows local users to read data from arbitrary kernel-memory locations by leveraging root access and providing a crafted first argument.

Name: CVE-2014-8824
Description: The kernel in Apple OS X before 10.10.2 does not properly validate IODataQueue object metadata fields, which allows attackers to execute arbitrary code in a privileged context via a crafted app.

Name: CVE-2014-8825
Description: The kernel in Apple OS X before 10.10.2 does not properly perform identitysvc validation of certain directory-service functionality, which allows local users to gain privileges or spoof directory-service responses via unspecified vectors.

Name: CVE-2014-8826
Description: LaunchServices in Apple OS X before 10.10.2 does not properly handle file-type metadata, which allows attackers to bypass the Gatekeeper protection mechanism via a crafted JAR archive.
References: APPLE:APPLE-SA-2015-01-27-4   |   URL:http://lists.apple.com/archives/security-announce/2015/Jan/msg00003.html   |   BID:72341   |   URL:http://www.securityfocus.com/bid/72341   |   BUGTRAQ:20150128 [AMPLIA-ARA100614] OS X Gatekeeper Bypass Vulnerability   |   URL:http://www.securityfocus.com/archive/1/534567/100/0/threaded   |   CONFIRM:http://support.apple.com/HT204244   |   EXPLOIT-DB:35934   |   URL:http://www.exploit-db.com/exploits/35934   |   FULLDISC:20150128 [AMPLIA-ARA100614] OS X Gatekeeper Bypass Vulnerability   |   URL:http://seclists.org/fulldisclosure/2015/Jan/109   |   MISC:http://packetstormsecurity.com/files/130147/OS-X-Gatekeeper-Bypass.html   |   MISC:https://www.ampliasecurity.com/advisories/os-x-gatekeeper-bypass-vulnerability.html   |   OSVDB:117659   |   URL:http://www.osvdb.org/117659   |   SECTRACK:1031650   |   URL:http://www.securitytracker.com/id/1031650   |   XF:macosx-cve20148826-sec-bypass(100519)   |   URL:https://exchange.xforce.ibmcloud.com/vulnerabilities/100519

Name: CVE-2014-8827
Description: LoginWindow in Apple OS X before 10.10.2 does not transition to the lock-screen state immediately upon being woken from sleep, which allows physically proximate attackers to obtain sensitive information by reading the screen.

Name: CVE-2014-8828
Description: Sandbox in Apple OS X before 10.10 allows attackers to write to the sandbox-profile cache via a sandboxed app that includes a com.apple.sandbox segment in a path.

Name: CVE-2014-8829
Description: SceneKit in Apple OS X before 10.10.2 allows attackers to execute arbitrary code or cause a denial of service (out-of-bounds write) via a crafted app.

Name: CVE-2014-8830
Description: Heap-based buffer overflow in SceneKit in Apple OS X before 10.10.2 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code or cause a denial of service (application crash) via a crafted accessor element in a Collada file.

Name: CVE-2014-8831
Description: security_taskgate in Apple OS X before 10.10.2 allows attackers to read group-ACL-restricted keychain items of arbitrary apps via a crafted app with a signature from a (1) self-signed certificate or (2) Developer ID certificate.

Name: CVE-2014-8832
Description: The indexing functionality in Spotlight in Apple OS X before 10.10.2 writes memory contents to an external hard drive, which allows local users to obtain sensitive information by reading from this drive.

Name: CVE-2014-8833
Description: SpotlightIndex in Apple OS X before 10.10.2 does not properly perform deserialization during access to a permission cache, which allows local users to read search results associated with other users' protected files via a Spotlight query.

Name: CVE-2014-8834
Description: UserAccountUpdater in Apple OS X 10.10 before 10.10.2 stores a PDF document's password in a printing preference file, which allows local users to obtain sensitive information by reading a file.

Name: CVE-2014-8835
Description: The xpc_data_get_bytes function in libxpc in Apple OS X before 10.10.2 does not verify that a dictionary's Attributes key has the xpc_data data type, which allows attackers to execute arbitrary code by providing a crafted dictionary to sysmond, related to an "XPC type confusion" issue.
References: APPLE:APPLE-SA-2015-01-27-4   |   URL:http://lists.apple.com/archives/security-announce/2015/Jan/msg00003.html   |   BID:71992   |   URL:http://www.securityfocus.com/bid/71992   |   CONFIRM:http://support.apple.com/HT204244   |   EXPLOIT-DB:35742   |   URL:http://www.exploit-db.com/exploits/35742/   |   MISC:http://packetstormsecurity.com/files/135701/OS-X-Sysmond-XPC-Type-Confusion-Privilege-Escalation.html   |   MISC:https://code.google.com/p/google-security-research/issues/detail?id=121   |   SECTRACK:1031650   |   URL:http://www.securitytracker.com/id/1031650   |   XF:macosx-cve20148835-priv-esc(100530)   |   URL:https://exchange.xforce.ibmcloud.com/vulnerabilities/100530

Name: CVE-2014-8836
Description: The Bluetooth driver in Apple OS X before 10.10.2 allows attackers to execute arbitrary code in a privileged context or cause a denial of service (arbitrary-size bzero of kernel memory) via a crafted app.

Name: CVE-2014-8837
Description: Multiple unspecified vulnerabilities in the Bluetooth driver in Apple OS X before 10.10.2 allow attackers to execute arbitrary code in a privileged context via a crafted app.

Name: CVE-2014-8838
Description: The Security component in Apple OS X before 10.10.2 does not properly process cached information about app certificates, which allows attackers to bypass the Gatekeeper protection mechanism by leveraging access to a revoked Developer ID certificate for signing a crafted app.

Name: CVE-2014-8839
Description: Spotlight in Apple OS X before 10.10.2 does not enforce the Mail "Load remote content in messages" configuration, which allows remote attackers to discover recipient IP addresses by including an inline image in an HTML e-mail message and logging HTTP requests for this image's URL.

Name: CVE-2014-8840
Description: The iTunes Store component in Apple iOS before 8.1.3 allows remote attackers to bypass a Safari sandbox protection mechanism by leveraging redirection of an SSL URL to the iTunes Store.

Name: CVE-2014-8866
Description: The compatibility mode hypercall argument translation in Xen 3.3.x through 4.4.x, when running on a 64-bit hypervisor, allows local 32-bit HVM guests to cause a denial of service (host crash) via vectors involving altering the high halves of registers while in 64-bit mode.
References: BID:71332   |   URL:http://www.securityfocus.com/bid/71332   |   CONFIRM:http://support.citrix.com/article/CTX200288   |   CONFIRM:http://support.citrix.com/article/CTX201794   |   CONFIRM:http://xenbits.xen.org/xsa/advisory-111.html   |   DEBIAN:DSA-3140   |   URL:http://www.debian.org/security/2015/dsa-3140   |   GENTOO:GLSA-201504-04   |   URL:https://security.gentoo.org/glsa/201504-04   |   SECUNIA:59937   |   URL:http://secunia.com/advisories/59937   |   SECUNIA:62672   |   URL:http://secunia.com/advisories/62672   |   SUSE:openSUSE-SU-2015:0226   |   URL:http://lists.opensuse.org/opensuse-security-announce/2015-02/msg00005.html   |   SUSE:openSUSE-SU-2015:0256   |   URL:http://lists.opensuse.org/opensuse-security-announce/2015-02/msg00010.html

Name: CVE-2014-8867
Description: The acceleration support for the "REP MOVS" instruction in Xen 4.4.x, 3.2.x, and earlier lacks properly bounds checking for memory mapped I/O (MMIO) emulated in the hypervisor, which allows local HVM guests to cause a denial of service (host crash) via unspecified vectors.
References: BID:71331   |   URL:http://www.securityfocus.com/bid/71331   |   CONFIRM:http://kb.juniper.net/InfoCenter/index?page=content&id=JSA10705   |   CONFIRM:http://support.citrix.com/article/CTX200288   |   CONFIRM:http://support.citrix.com/article/CTX201794   |   CONFIRM:http://xenbits.xenproject.org/xsa/advisory-112.html   |   DEBIAN:DSA-3140   |   URL:http://www.debian.org/security/2015/dsa-3140   |   GENTOO:GLSA-201504-04   |   URL:https://security.gentoo.org/glsa/201504-04   |   REDHAT:RHSA-2015:0783   |   URL:http://rhn.redhat.com/errata/RHSA-2015-0783.html   |   SECUNIA:59949   |   URL:http://secunia.com/advisories/59949   |   SECUNIA:62672   |   URL:http://secunia.com/advisories/62672   |   SUSE:openSUSE-SU-2015:0226   |   URL:http://lists.opensuse.org/opensuse-security-announce/2015-02/msg00005.html   |   SUSE:openSUSE-SU-2015:0256   |   URL:http://lists.opensuse.org/opensuse-security-announce/2015-02/msg00010.html

Name: CVE-2014-8868
Description: EntryPass N5200 Active Network Control Panel does not properly restrict access, which allows remote attackers to obtain the administrator username and password, and possibly other sensitive information, via a request to /4.
References: BUGTRAQ:20141201 [RT-SA-2014-011] EntryPass N5200 Credentials Disclosure   |   URL:http://www.securityfocus.com/archive/1/534128/100/0/threaded   |   FULLDISC:20141201 [RT-SA-2014-011] EntryPass N5200 Credentials Disclosure   |   URL:http://seclists.org/fulldisclosure/2014/Dec/2   |   MISC:https://www.redteam-pentesting.de/advisories/rt-sa-2014-011

Name: CVE-2014-8869
Description: Multiple cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerabilities in mobiquo/smartbanner/welcome.php in the Tapatalk (com.tapatalk.wbb4) plugin 1.x before 1.1.2 for Woltlab Burning Board 4.0 allow remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via the (1) app_android_id or (2) app_kindle_url parameter.
References: BID:71997   |   URL:http://www.securityfocus.com/bid/71997   |   BUGTRAQ:20150112 [RT-SA-2014-015] Cross-site Scripting in Tapatalk Plugin for WoltLab Burning Board 4.0   |   URL:http://www.securityfocus.com/archive/1/534449/100/0/threaded   |   CONFIRM:https://support.tapatalk.com/threads/tapatalk-for-woltlab-plugin-release-announcement-and-changelog.19540   |   FULLDISC:20150112 [RT-SA-2014-015] Cross-site Scripting in Tapatalk Plugin for WoltLab Burning Board 4.0   |   URL:http://seclists.org/fulldisclosure/2015/Jan/31   |   MISC:https://www.redteam-pentesting.de/en/advisories/rt-sa-2014-015/-cross-site-scripting-in-tapatalk-plugin-for-woltlab-burning-board-4-0

Name: CVE-2014-8870
Description: Open redirect vulnerability in mobiquo/smartbanner/welcome.php in the Tapatalk (com.tapatalk.wbb4) plugin before 1.1.2 for Woltlab Burning Board 4.0 allows remote attackers to redirect users to arbitrary web sites and conduct phishing attacks via a URL in the board_url parameter.

Description: Directory traversal vulnerability in hybris Commerce software suite 5.0.3.3 and earlier, 5.0.0.3 and earlier, 5.0.4.4 and earlier, 5.1.0.1 and earlier, 5.1.1.2 and earlier, 5.2.0.3 and earlier, and 5.3.0.1 and earlier.

Name: CVE-2014-8872
Description: Improper Verification of Cryptographic Signature in AVM FRITZ!Box 6810 LTE after firmware 5.22, FRITZ!Box 6840 LTE after firmware 5.23, and other models with firmware 5.50.

Name: CVE-2014-8873
Description: A .desktop file in the Debian openjdk-7 package 7u79-2.5.5-1~deb8u1 includes a MIME type registration that is added to /etc/mailcap by mime-support, which allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a JAR file.
References: BID:76019   |   URL:http://www.securityfocus.com/bid/76019   |   DEBIAN:DSA-3235   |   URL:http://www.debian.org/security/2015/dsa-3235   |   DEBIAN:DSA-3316   |   URL:http://www.debian.org/security/2015/dsa-3316   |   MLIST:[oss-security] 20150718 CVE-2014-8873 was fixed in DSA-3235-1   |   URL:http://www.openwall.com/lists/oss-security/2015/07/18/2

Name: CVE-2014-8874
Description: The ke_questionnaire extension 2.5.2 and earlier for TYPO3 uses predictable names for the questionnaire answer forms, which makes it easier for remote attackers to obtain sensitive information via a direct request.
References: BUGTRAQ:20141201 [RT-SA-2014-009] Information Disclosure in TYPO3 Extension ke_questionnaire   |   URL:http://www.securityfocus.com/archive/1/534126/100/0/threaded   |   FULLDISC:20141201 [RT-SA-2014-009] Information Disclosure in TYPO3 Extension ke_questionnaire   |   URL:http://seclists.org/fulldisclosure/2014/Dec/1   |   MISC:https://www.redteam-pentesting.de/advisories/rt-sa-2014-009

Name: CVE-2014-8875
Description: The XML_RPC_cd function in lib/pear/XML/RPC.php in Revive Adserver before 3.0.6 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (CPU and memory consumption) via a crafted XML-RPC request, aka an XML Entity Expansion (XEE) attack.

Name: CVE-2014-8877
Description: The alterSearchQuery function in lib/controllers/CmdownloadController.php in the CreativeMinds CM Downloads Manager plugin before 2.0.4 for WordPress allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary PHP code via the CMDsearch parameter to cmdownloads/, which is processed by the PHP create_function function.
